name: Polygraph (Diminim)
description:
Experience taking a polygraph test with this rhythmic 5 minute shortie! /s

You'll be under a lot of pressure but if you tap [spacebar] right as the heart's timer hits 0 you'll manage to stay calm.

The game's a little unnerving, but not by much. If you're easily bothered be aware.

(Produced for the Love2d 2020 game jam in Love2d in 11.2)

-- The splash effect is public domain, and is the only asset not produced during the jam.
